name: Gaian Guardians
description:
Gaian Guardians is an RPG Maker game and will feature about 4 chapters.The current Demo is just the prologue for the beginning of the Player's journey

Set between two worlds.Gaia & Darkos where both were once peaceful planets now torn apart by constant & unending war

One day a group called Light Order & it's Keepers managed to restore balance between the two worlds by signing a peace agreement & ensuring it will last for more than 500 years.But soon after, the unexpected came upon them

A large & mysterious horde with several Gaian & Darkos folk alike have become cultists to summon creatures that are not from either worlds the Gaians & Darkos know of and began their siege upon the Keepers home, Drakengard and that is where you come in

You are the last member of the Keepers and after leaving your home with your friend & companion...all you can remember from the ensuing chaos was your brother's last words "Bring the message to The Outsider for it is he who can defeat them" and so you began embark upon a brand new journey that would lead up to numerous events & encounter new faces & even worlds beyond Gaia and Darkos

This is the story of the Gaian Guardians
